task.title: Creating an animated GIF from video format on imgur.com
task.shortdesc: Imgur.com allows you to upload video URLs directly from YouTube without having to download or convert. You are also able to add text to the GIF.

prereq.p: You will need to have a video file chosen beforehand

step.cmd: Find a video URL from YouTube
Select the section you want turned into a GIF
You are able to add text in the transparent box that appears on the video
